properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 5:49PM CST until January 16 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Sucarnoochee River At Livingston Affecting Sumter County.

.Heavy rainfall, both over the weekend and again today, has lead to
rising levels on the Sucarnoochee River, and a Flood Warning is now
in effect for the Sucarnoochee at Livingston.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Sucarnoochee River At Livingston.
* from late tonight to Thursday afternoon...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  5:30 PM Monday The stage Was 14.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by early tomorrow  and continue
to rise to near 19.0 feet by Wednesday morning. The river will fall
below flood stage by early Thursday morning.
* Impact...At 18.0 feet...Flooding of farm lands around Livinsgton
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner
if conditions warrant.
